channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: 'Total War: Rome Remastered' revives an RTS classic on April 29th
item.description: Rome: Total War, one of the best real-time strategy games ever released, is getting a remaster.

item.title: Samsung adds a podcast section to its free-entertainment app
item.description: If you own a Samsung phone, you now have yet another way to listen to your favorite audio shows

item.title: 'Back 4 Blood' is delayed until October 12th
item.description: The spiritual successor to 'Left 4 Dead' was supposed to come out in June.

item.title: Sony is making a 'Ghost of Tsushima' movie with John Wick director
item.description: Ghost of Tsushima is getting the silver screen treatment.

item.title: Porsche adds the Taycan EV to its car subscription service
item.description: The Taycan 4S won't be available on the multi-vehicle plan at first, however.

item.title: Triumph previews TE-1 electric bike concept with fast charging battery
item.description: Historic British motorcycle Triumph has shared some of the first details on its TE-1 electric bike project.

item.title: What it will take for humans to colonize the Moon and Mars
item.description: When it lifts off in late 2024, NASA's Artemis mission will perform crucial groundwork needed for humanity to further explore and potentially colonize the Moon as well as eventually serve as a jumping-off point in our quest to reach Mars. But given how inhospitable space is, NASA and its partners will face a significant challenge in keeping tomorrow's colonists alive and well.

item.title: Paramount+ will stream Serie A soccer in the US starting next season
item.description: ViacomCBS snatched the rights away from ESPN+.

item.title: Watch Congress grill Facebook, Twitter and Google’s CEOs at 12PM ET
item.description: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg, Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey and Google CEO Sundar Pichai are set to testify at a House Energy and Commerce Committee hearing on misinformation.

item.title: This $40 computer science training includes classes on Python, Linux and more
item.description: The 2021 Complete Computer Science Training Bundle has 212 hours worth of instruction in TensorFlow, Keras, R and Discrete Math, as well as a complete web developer course.

item.title: Here's how you shift gears in Tesla's updated Model S and Model X
item.description: A video has revealed just how you shift in the refreshed Tesla Model S and Model X — using swipes on the touchscreen.

item.title: ‘Dota 2’ update should make things much easier for newcomers
item.description: An overhauled new player experience arrives the same day as Netflix’s 'Dota' anime.

item.title: Master & Dynamic MW08 review: Small changes make a huge difference
item.description: Master & Dynamic covers nearly all of the bases for its latest flagship earbuds, which are undoubtedly the company’s best yet.

item.title: The repairable Fairphone 2 gets an Android update five years after launch
item.description: Ethical phone company Fairphone's first modular handset, the five-year-old Fairphone 2, is getting an Android 9 update.

item.title: Qualcomm's Snapdragon 780G brings 5nm tech to affordable phones
item.description: A faster CPU and 5nm processor promises to make those devices faster.

item.title: Sigma's fp L is a tiny full-frame camera with a 61-megapixel sensor
item.description: Sigma has unveiled what it calls the "world's smallest and lightest single lens mirrorless camera," a claim that's easy to believe in looking at it.

item.title: The UK's Alan Turing £50 bank note is a love letter to coding
item.description: The UK has unveiled its £50 Alan Turing bank note, and it's appropriately both very secure and a nod to the computer scientist's achievements.

item.title: Spotify updates its desktop and web apps to match its mobile experience
item.description: Spotify has overhauled its desktop and web apps, adding new playlist controls and the ability to download music and podcasts.

item.title: Amazon begins selling NFL merch after securing Thursday Night Football deal
item.description: Amazon is adding thousands of new NFL products to its online store including jerseys and accessories on the heels of its Thursday Night Football deal.

item.title: So you've bought an OLED TV — now what?
item.description: Here's a list of the best accessories to buy for your OLED TV, plus tips to make the most out of your new set.

item.title: B&O's Beoplay HX headphones offer ANC and 35 hours of battery life
item.description: Bang & Olufsen has launched Beoplay HX, a new pair of wireless headphones that offers up to 35 hours of use with both Bluetooth and Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) switched on.

item.title: Google's 'Memory' feature could turn Assistant into an Android organizer
item.description: Google is working on a new feature for Assistant on Android called "Memory" that could transform it into into a handy organizer.

item.title: The Morning After: Dyson's new laser-equipped vacuum
item.description: Dyson put a laser on a vacuum for some reason.

item.title: Microsoft shows off Windows 10's new File Explorer icons
item.description: The latest Windows 10 Insider Preview build includes the latest batch of redesigned folders for the platform.

item.title: Samsung's 512GB DDR5 module is a showcase for the future of RAM
item.description: Samsung has unveiled a new RAM module that shows the potential of DDR5 memory in terms of speed and capacity.
